entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Thursday 23 March 2023
